required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Tislelizumab Combined With Lenvatinib for Perioperative Treatment of Resectable Primary Hepatocellular Carcinoma
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective, One-arm, Phase II Clinical Study of Tislelizumab Combined With Lenvatinib for Perioperative Treatment of Resectable Primary Hepatocellular Carcinoma With a High Risk of Recurrence.

lead_sponsor.agency: Tianjin Medical University Cancer Institute and Hospital

clinical_study.source: Tianjin Medical University Cancer Institute and Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: This is a prospective, one-arm, phase II clinical study of Tislelizumab combined with Lenvatinib for perioperative treatment of resectable primary hepatocellular carcinoma with a high risk of recurrence.

primary_outcome.measure: Safety as measured by the number of grade 3 and grade 4 adverse events that occurred when subjects participated in the study, as defined by CTCAE v5.0.
Feasibility as measured by rate of enrollment
primary_outcome.description: It's defined as a delay of surgery for any reason no more than 49 days compared to the specified planned surgery time (i.e., delay of surgery ≤42 days and scheduled surgery for 7 days).

other_outcome.measure: To explore genomic biomarkers of clinical remission/drug resistance (TMB, TNB, ITH, HLA subtype, HLA-LOH ) in combination with Tislelizumab and Lenvatinib.

Identification of tumor microenvironmental biomarkers (tumor Infiltrating lymphocytes, biomarkers expressed on T cells ) for clinical remission/drug resistance in combination with Tislelizumab and Lenvatinib.
To investigate the clinical efficacy of PD-L1 expression in predicting the combination of Tislelizumab and Lenvatinib.

intervention.description: Pre-operation: Tislelizumab, 200mg, iv,d1,q3w, 2-4 cycles; Lenvatinib,8mg/kg,po,qd,d1-d84. Operation Postoperation: 4-8 weeks after surgery, Tislelizumab, 200mg, iv,d1,q3w; Lenvatinib,8mg/kg,po,qd, up to one year.

facility.name: Tianjin Medical University Cancer Insititute and Hospital
